name: Undead Blocks
storyline: Undead Blocks is calling on all Survivors to answer the Call to Arms and kill zombies to earn in-game rewards! Undead Blocks is the world's first AAA crypto first person zombie shooter. Undead Blocks players can earn rewards every day by killing zombies, and can boost their earnings by killing while using Weapon Loadout NFTs. Players can also participate in weekly leaderboards and challenges to earn Gold ZBUX, which can be swapped for select cryptocurrencies or used to obtain rare and limited edition in-game items and weapons. Players will also earn Standard ZBUX which allow Survivors to level up their Weapon Loadout NFT and build equity in the assets that they own as we rapidly enter a digital renaissance. With a full storyline and character arcs built in, Undead Blocks will be prioritizing play AND earn, with secondary tokenomics and a value proposition that are crafted for sustainability and peace of mind for players and investors alike. Power to the gamers.
summary:
Undead Blocks is the world's first multiplayer kill-to-earn zombie survival game on The Ethereum Network.

Collect weapons and slay endless waves of zombies in an immersive FPS experience.
